Here is a figure which is produced with the Python sample: /nucleardatapy_sample/astro_setupMtov_plot.py

.. figure:: ../../../version-0.2/nucleardatapy_samples/figs/plot_astro_setupMtov.png
	:width: 70 %
	:alt: map to buried treasure

	The probability distribution function for the TOV mass constructed from radio and gravitational-wave observations.
	The different colors correspond to the different sources.
